name: Cooking Tour with the Master Chef  - V10
description: Hanoi half-day cooking tour with Master Chef Mai is well-designed for those who wish to have real experience in preparing a “Vietnamese meal”. Particularly, the cooking class will be organized right at Chef Mai’s home; therefore, you will not only self-cook Vietnamese dish but also experience warm hospitality of Vietnamese’s family. Surely, a Vietnamese meal full of delicious traditional dishes with her family will fascinate you.
